subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about my situation. It's true, I've been dealing with a lot of people who promised to help me receive my funds but nothing has come out of it yet.

I'm interested in getting in touch with the UPS agent you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about this? How can I be sure that this is not another false promise?

Also, could you explain why my funds are at the UPS office and why they haven't been cleared yet? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jodi

subject: Re: Hello
body:

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello there! I hope you're doing well. 

I'm a bit confused about the situation you've described. Could you please clarify what these funds are for? And what is this clearance fee you mentioned? Also, could you explain why I need to contact the bank manager? 

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Best wishes,
Jodi

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Iâ€™m doing good Jodi, Iâ€™ll explain properly for you to understand, the $100

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for explaining that to me. I'm glad to hear that the agents I've been dealing with will be arrested, they seemed a bit fishy to me. 

So, if I understand correctly, the clearance fee is necessary for my donation funds to be released? And contacting the bank manager directly will ensure that I'm dealing with the right person and not any impostors?

Could you please tell me more about this clearance fee? How much is it and how do I go about paying it? Also, could you provide me with the contact details of the rightful bank manager?

I appreciate your help in this matter.

Best wishes,
Jodi

subject: Re: Hello

subject: Re: Hello
body:

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation about the clearance fee. I'm not very familiar with Bitcoin or Gift cards, could you please explain a bit more about these payment options? 

Also, I'm curious to know how the clearance process works and why it's so important. Could you provide some more information on this?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
